product_overview: BD Lifeline Connect is a blood donation platform designed to connect blood donors with patients in need. It provides a seamless experience for users to request blood, find donors, and manage their profiles, leveraging modern web technologies and real-time updates.
core_goals: Enable users to create and manage blood requests to facilitate timely blood donations.
Allow users to search for and connect with available blood donors by blood group and location.
Implement a secure and user-friendly authentication system including email/password and Google OAuth.
Provide comprehensive user profile management including completion flow and donor availability status.
Offer real-time updates on donor status and blood requests to keep users informed.
Deliver a responsive and accessible UI with modern design principles for all user interactions.
key_features: Authentication system supporting email/password and Google OAuth with sign up, sign in, password reset, and email confirmation flows.
Complete user profile management with creation, update, deletion, and profile completion steps.
Blood request management including creation, reading, updating, deletion, filtering, pagination, and search.
Donor registration and management with real-time availability toggling and searchable donor lists.
Real-time subscription for donor status updates ensuring users have current information.
Informative homepage with hero section, trusted companies, urgent requests, donation impact stats, testimonials, and educational content.
Navigation with header, footer, theme toggling, and error boundary handling for robust user experience.
Backend integration with Supabase for authentication, database operations, and serverless edge functions for admin actions.
Custom React hooks for efficient state management and API communication.
Additional informative pages such as About, Contact, and 404 Not Found for complete user pathway.
user_flow_summary: Visitors land on the homepage to browse urgent blood requests and donor lists without logging in.
Users sign up via email/password or Google OAuth and receive email confirmation prompts.
After authentication, users complete their profiles by providing key information such as blood group and location.
Authenticated users can create blood requests specifying details like urgency, contact info, and hospital location.
Users looking to donate register as donors and toggle their availability status to appear in donor searches.
Users search for donors or requests with filters and pagination to find suitable matches.
Real-time updates notify users of changes in donor availability or urgent blood requests.
Users manage their profiles and requests via a personal dashboard enabling updates and deletions as needed.
validation_criteria: Authentication flows must work end-to-end with all user states including sign up, sign in, password reset, and email confirmation.
Profile completion is mandatory and properly guides users to input required donor information.
Blood request creation and management features handle CRUD operations with accurate filtering and search results.
Donor registration and availability toggling update in real-time and reflect immediately in the donor search results.
Homepage components render correctly and show up-to-date information such as urgent requests and impact statistics.
Navigation and layout components must be responsive and handle errors gracefully with the error boundary.
All database interactions follow security best practices with proper Supabase RLS policies ensuring user data protection.
Real-time subscription mechanism for donor updates is reliable and displays status changes instantly.
Additional pages (About, Contact, 404) are accessible and display appropriate content without errors.
